instructionsTitle:
Report Definition '{0}' can be configured using the following steps: 

1 - Identify the Report content (Search Data). 
2 - Set Layout to display formatted data (Set Layout). 
3 - Check the preview of the Report (Show Preview).
4 - Finally save the Report Definition which will preserve the configuration selected (Save).
showSearchNotRunMessage: Please perform Search to populate list of Chart properties.
showSearchNotRunColumnMessage: Please perform Search to populate list of Column properties.
pieChartMultiplePropMessage: Pie chart currently does not support multiple property series. Showing chart with first property only.
reportSaveFailedMessage: Save failed for "{0}", as number of properties selected for layout elements are more than permitted limit.
showChartCreateFailedMessage: "{0}" failed to be created. Please ensure all required fields are populated with values.
saveFailedNoObjectMessage: Save failed as report configuration is invalid. Please check Search criteria or Layout configuration.
previewFailedNoObjectMessage: Cannot continue with preview display as no valid search results are returned.
addToDashboardDesc: Add the selection to my report dashboard.
addGeneratedReport: Add the generated report to my report dashboard
Rb0ConfigureReportDesc: Set or Edit the parameters and the Layout for configuring the report.
Rb0AddChart1Desc: Add a chart and the properties to the report.
Rb0RemoveChartDesc: Remove the chart and its properties from the report.
Rb0GenerateAdvReportDesc: Fetch live data and generate the report.
Rb0EditReportDesc: Edit the Layout and parameters of the selected Report.
reportCreateErrorMessageTest: The Report Definition "{0}" was not created because "ID={1}" is not unique.
advSummReportDesc: Summarizes similar information, for example, change object status reports.
advItemReportDesc: Generated in the context of a specific object or objects, for example, workflow signoff for an item.
sampleSearchTip: Type Name of object to Search
itemReportinstructions:
Report Definition '{0}' can be configured using the following steps: 

1) Select Data Type by searching for the business object type and selecting it. For example, select a Schedule object.
2) Select Sample Source to search for the sample data. In this example, since the Schedule object was selected in the previous step, only schedule samples are available for selection.
3) Select Query to construct a query for obtaining the data for the report from Teamcenter.
4) Select Layout to define a layout for the report, specify a title, and add a chart and a table.
removeClassWithConfigMessage: "{0}", "{1}", Query and Segments will be removed. Do you wish to proceed?
removeSampleWithConfigMessage: "{0}", Query and Segments will be removed. Do you wish to proceed?
showSampleObjectMissingMessageTxt: "{0}" cannot be edited because the item is missing. Search for a new item to continue.
addShareReportDesc: Share the Report with the selected Organization or Project.
removeShareReportDesc: Unshare the Report with the selected Organization or Project.
defaultChartViewText: Chart details will be shown here. Select the chart type and edit the field to chart on.
defaultNotSharedDesc: Select from the available list and use the forward arrow to start sharing.
searchItemContext: Search for an item to use as context for the report.
searchDataContext: Search for data to use in the summary report.
addRelationContext: One or more relations are required for an item report.
noSavedReportHint: Reports saved to files will be shown here. Generate a report with the option of saving to a file.
emptyReportAreaHint: Report Templates will be shown here.
noPrintedReportHint: Printed reports will be shown here.
showMyReportsSwaHint: Select a saved report file to view the details.
printOutsLocationSwaHint: Select a report printout to view the details.
showReportBuilderReportsSwaHint: Select a report template to view the details.
reportsDashboardHint: Report saved to my dashboard will be shown here.
generateReportHint: Reports that have been generated in this tab will be shown here.
privatelySharedReportSuccessMessage: "{0}" was not shared with other users.
addRelationFailureMsg: The relation cannot be added because no data meets the selected criteria.
changeReportTypeConfirmationMsg: Unsaved edits will be discarded if the type changes.
itemMissing: The report cannot be edited because the item is missing.
